function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to collective actions","Impact":"Increase in spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize collective actions through education and communication","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for outreach and awareness","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities and community leaders"},{"Description":"Inequality leading to social unrest","Impact":"Decrease in social stability and increased potential for spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Address inequalities through policy and resource allocation","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for identifying inequalities","People":"Marginalized communities and socioeconomically disadvantaged groups","Owner":"Government and social welfare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate institutional trust","Impact":"Reduction in adherence to regulations and guidelines","Mitigation":"Promote transparency and accountability in governance, and provide accurate and timely information","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent data management","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public institutions"}]}
